FileHeaderRecord.Name: File Header Record
FileHeaderRecord.Description: Identifies the sender, receiver, and essential creation details of the ACH file.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '1' indicating a File Header Record in the ACH file.

PriorityCode.Name: Priority Code
PriorityCode.Description: Two-digit code for processing priority; '01' is commonly used.

ImmediateDestination.Name: Immediate Destination
ImmediateDestination.Description: Routing number of the receiving financial institution for the file.

ImmediateOrigin.Name: Immediate Origin
ImmediateOrigin.Description: Routing number of the file's originating financial institution.

FileCreationDate.Name: File Creation Date
FileCreationDate.Description: Date when the file was created, in 'YYMMDD' format.

FileCreationTime.Name: File Creation Time
FileCreationTime.Description: Time when the file was created, in 'HHMM' 24-hour format.

FileIDModifier.Name: File ID Modifier
FileIDModifier.Description: Unique character to distinguish multiple files created on the same date.

RecordSize.Name: Record Size
RecordSize.Description: Size of each record in the file; always '094'.

BlockingFactor.Name: Blocking Factor
BlockingFactor.Description: Indicates the number of records per block; typically '10'.

FormatCode.Name: Format Code
FormatCode.Description: Specifies the file format; always set to '1' for ACH files.

ImmediateDestinationName.Name: Immediate Destination Name
ImmediateDestinationName.Description: Name of the destination financial institution.

ImmediateOriginName.Name: Immediate Origin Name
ImmediateOriginName.Description: Name of the originating financial institution.

ReferenceCode.Name: Reference Code
ReferenceCode.Description: Optional field for a reference code, not required for processing.

BatchHeaderRecord.Name: Batch Header Record
BatchHeaderRecord.Description: Defines batch details, including originating company and service class.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '5' indicating a Batch Header Record.

ServiceClassCode.Name: Service Class Code
ServiceClassCode.Description: Defines the transaction type in the batch (e.g., '200' for credits only).

CompanyName.Name: Company Name
CompanyName.Description: The name of the originating company for identification.

CompanyDiscretionaryData.Name: Company Discretionary Data
CompanyDiscretionaryData.Description: Optional field for additional data specific to the company.

CompanyIdentification.Name: Company Identification
CompanyIdentification.Description: A unique identifier for the company, often the Federal Tax ID.

StandardEntryClassCode.Name: Standard Entry Class Code
StandardEntryClassCode.Description: Code specifying the type of transaction, such as 'PPD' for payroll.

CompanyDescriptiveDate.Name: Company Descriptive Date
CompanyDescriptiveDate.Description: Optional date for reference purposes, not processed by ACH.

EffectiveEntryDate.Name: Effective Entry Date
EffectiveEntryDate.Description: The date when transactions are intended to be posted.

SettlementDate.Name: Settlement Date
SettlementDate.Description: Date of settlement, determined by the ACH operator.

OriginatorStatusCode.Name: Originator Status Code
OriginatorStatusCode.Description: Status of the originator, typically '1' for financial institutions.

OriginatingDFIIdentification.Name: Originating DFI Identification
OriginatingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the originating financial institution.

BatchNumber.Name: Batch Number
BatchNumber.Description: Unique batch number within the ACH file.

EntryDetailRecord.Name: Entry Detail Record
EntryDetailRecord.Description: Contains specific transaction details, such as account number, transaction code, and amount.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '6' indicating an Entry Detail Record.

TransactionCode.Name: Transaction Code
TransactionCode.Description: Code specifying the type of transaction (credit or debit).

ReceivingDFIIdentification.Name: Receiving DFI Identification
ReceivingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the receiving bank.

CheckDigit.Name: Check Digit
CheckDigit.Description: Single-digit checksum for verifying the routing number.

DFIAccountNumber.Name: DFI Account Number
DFIAccountNumber.Description: Account number at the receiving bank.

Amount.Name: Amount
Amount.Description: Transaction amount in cents, without a decimal.

IndividualIdentificationNumber.Name: Individual Identification Number
IndividualIdentificationNumber.Description: Optional ID for the receiver, such as an invoice or employee number.

ReceivingIndividualName.Name: Receiving Individual Name
ReceivingIndividualName.Description: Name of the individual or entity receiving the transaction.

DiscretionaryData.Name: Discretionary Data
DiscretionaryData.Description: Optional two-character field for company use.

AddendaRecordIndicator.Name: Addenda Record Indicator
AddendaRecordIndicator.Description: Indicates if addenda are present: '0' for none, '1' if addenda exist.

TraceNumber.Name: Trace Number
TraceNumber.Description: Unique number assigned to each transaction for tracking.

AddendaRecord.Name: Addenda Record
AddendaRecord.Description: Adds supplementary details for an associated Entry Detail Record, often used for tax payments or remittance information.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '7' indicating an Addenda Record.

AddendaTypeCode.Name: Addenda Type Code
AddendaTypeCode.Description: Specifies the type of addenda information included.

PaymentRelatedInformation.Name: Payment Related Information
PaymentRelatedInformation.Description: Supplementary information about the payment, often used for invoices, taxes, or detailed remittance data.

AddendaSequenceNumber.Name: Addenda Sequence Number
AddendaSequenceNumber.Description: Indicates the order of addenda records if multiple addenda are associated with an entry.

EntryDetailSequenceNumber.Name: Entry Detail Sequence Number
EntryDetailSequenceNumber.Description: Unique sequence number matching the associated Entry Detail Record.

BatchControlRecord.Name: Batch Control Record
BatchControlRecord.Description: Summarizes the batch, providing totals for debits, credits, and counts of entries.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '8' indicating a Batch Control Record.

ServiceClassCode.Name: Service Class Code
ServiceClassCode.Description: Service class code that matches the Batch Header Record.

EntryAddendaCount.Name: Entry Addenda Count
EntryAddendaCount.Description: Total count of Entry Detail and Addenda Records in the batch.

EntryHash.Name: Entry Hash
EntryHash.Description: Hash of the routing numbers in the batch for data integrity verification.

TotalDebitEntryDollarAmount.Name: Total Debit Entry Dollar Amount
TotalDebitEntryDollarAmount.Description: Sum of all debit amounts in the batch.

TotalCreditEntryDollarAmount.Name: Total Credit Entry Dollar Amount
TotalCreditEntryDollarAmount.Description: Sum of all credit amounts in the batch.

CompanyIdentification.Name: Company Identification
CompanyIdentification.Description: Identifies the company for the batch, matching the Batch Header Record.

MessageAuthenticationCode.Name: Message Authentication Code
MessageAuthenticationCode.Description: Code used for data integrity verification, if applicable.

OriginatingDFIIdentification.Name: Originating DFI Identification
OriginatingDFIIdentification.Description: Routing number of the originating DFI.

BatchNumber.Name: Batch Number
BatchNumber.Description: Unique identifier for the batch, assigned sequentially.

FileControlRecord.Name: File Control Record
FileControlRecord.Description: Provides summary information for the entire ACH file, including batch counts and total dollar amounts.

RecordTypeCode.Name: Record Type Code
RecordTypeCode.Description: Fixed code '9' indicating a File Control Record.

BatchCount.Name: Batch Count
BatchCount.Description: Total number of batches in the file.

BlockCount.Name: Block Count
BlockCount.Description: Number of physical blocks in the file.

EntryAddendaCount.Name: Entry Addenda Count
EntryAddendaCount.Description: Total count of all Entry Detail and Addenda Records in the file.

EntryHash.Name: Entry Hash
EntryHash.Description: Hash of all routing numbers in the file for integrity verification.

TotalDebitEntryDollarAmount.Name: Total Debit Entry Dollar Amount
TotalDebitEntryDollarAmount.Description: Sum of all debit transactions in the file.

TotalCreditEntryDollarAmount.Name: Total Credit Entry Dollar Amount
TotalCreditEntryDollarAmount.Description: Sum of all credit transactions in the file.
